metadata.title: CVE-2020-0404 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In uvc_scan_chain_forward of uvc_driver.c, there is a possible linked listcorruption due to an unusual root cause. This could lead to localescalation of privilege in the kernel with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-111893654References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
